Text.Page:
I came here with a hundred soldiers. I command fewer than ten now. So much loss, so little reason.

I don't know what the Mysterium is after. All I know is my orders from Velika are to hold my post and support the Mysterium at all cost.

What could possibly be worth all this blood?

Casidhe's Stand? It's named for a young centurion who sacrificed herself to ensure her wounded comrades got away.

If we don't see more reinforcements, you'll have to rename it Casidhe's Stand and Drustan's Folly.
